job title: Data Analyst in Indianapolis at BCforward
job description:
Job Description
Data Analyst

Hi Folks,
Hope you're good.

BCforward is looking for a Data Analyst in Carmel, IN.
Please let me know if you would like to move forward. Even, if you are not interested now I welcome referrals.

Job Title: Data Analyst
Duration: 6 weeks but could run longer.
Location: Carmel, IN

Job description:
Candidates will be pulling XML Data Files and putting into a SQLServer DBA and analyzing the data for the Risk Assessment Team at JD Byrider.

Required Skill Set/Experience:
  • SQL Server
  • XML file import/export
  • Power BI or equivalent BI Tools Experience
  • 5-7 years of experience with Enterprise level clients
IND123

Interested candidates please send resume in Word format Please reference job code 70382 when responding to this ad.
